ygData.subject: RE: Killing Dwarves
ygData.msgSnippet: The dwarves in oot can be pulled 1 at a time and are good exp if you fight them by yourself, but lately it seems as though this is a very popular area so I
ygData.messageBody:
The dwarves in oot can be pulled 1 at a time and are good exp if you fight
them by yourself, but lately it seems as though this is a very popular area
so I decided to leave and go elsewhere (still looking too at 32nd)∩┐╜ I
started fighting the dwarves at 28th and worked on them off and on to 32nd.∩┐╜
I'm currently in Kithcor killing undead but would love to kill the little
halfling guards at the wall in misty thickett, just a matter of dividing and
conquering : )

-----Original Message-----
From: Fraal [mailto:mata_eq@...]
Sent: Monday, November 15, 1999 9:31 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com; eq_eci_evil@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Killing Dwarves



I am∩┐╜interesed in killing Dwarves!

When lvls are they?∩┐╜∩┐╜∩┐╜
Can I pull 1 at a time?
∩┐╜
Any info is greatly appreciated.
∩┐╜
Thanks a bunch!
